uvi.description:
usb: dwc3: ep0: fix NULL pointer exception

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.44 by commit 470403639114895e2697c766fbe17be8d0e9b67a. For more details please see the references link.
